statements: SELECT * FROM malware_tracking ORDER BY malware_id DESC;
SELECT malware_name, date_detected FROM malware_tracking WHERE malware_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM malware_tracking WHERE malware_name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT malware_id, malware_name FROM malware_tracking WHERE infected_device_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM malware_tracking ORDER BY date_detected ASC;
SELECT malware_id, malware_name FROM malware_tracking WHERE malware_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM malware_tracking WHERE date_detected >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY malware_id DESC;
SELECT malware_id, malware_name, date_detected FROM malware_tracking WHERE malware_name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT malware_name, COUNT(infected_device_id) AS total_infections FROM malware_tracking GROUP BY malware_name HAVING total_infections > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT DATE(date_detected) AS detection_date, COUNT(malware_id) AS total_malware_detected FROM malware_tracking GROUP BY DATE(date_detected) ORDER BY detection_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM MalwarePropagation;
SELECT malware_id, malware_name FROM MalwarePropagation ORDER BY malware_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfectedDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, infected_date FROM InfectedDevices WHERE status = 'detected';
SELECT * FROM MalwarePropagation WHERE propagation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-01';
SELECT malware_name, malware_id FROM MalwarePropagation;
SELECT * FROM InfectedDevices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_name FROM InfectedDevices ORDER BY infected_date DESC;
SELECT malware_name, propagation_date FROM MalwarePropagation JOIN InfectedDevices ON malware_id = device_id;
SELECT COUNT(device_id) AS total_infected_devices FROM InfectedDevices WHERE infected_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Malware ORDER BY malware_name ASC;
SELECT malware_name, containment_status FROM Malware WHERE containment_status = true;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM InfectedDevices WHERE device_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT malware_name, infection_date FROM Malware JOIN InfectionHistory ON Malware.malware_id = InfectionHistory.malware_id;
SELECT device_name, last_scan_date FROM InfectedDevices WHERE last_scan_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Malware;
SELECT malware_id, malware_name, propagation_date FROM Malware ORDER BY malware_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, infection_date FROM InfectedDevices WHERE infection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT malware_name, containment_status FROM Malware WHERE containment_status = TRUE;

SELECT i.device_name, m.malware_name, i.infection_date FROM InfectedDevices i JOIN InfectionHistory ih ON i.device_id = ih.device_id JOIN Malware m ON ih.malware_id = m.malware_id ORDER BY i.infection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Malware
SELECT malware_name, malware_type FROM Malware
SELECT device_name, infection_status FROM InfectedDevices
SELECT malware_name, propagation_date FROM Malware JOIN MalwarePropagation ON Malware.malware_id = MalwarePropagation.malware_id
SELECT device_name, current_status FROM InfectedDevices JOIN DeviceStatus ON InfectedDevices.device_id = DeviceStatus.device_id
SELECT malware_name, malware_type FROM Malware WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware'
SELECT * FROM InfectedDevices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY device_name DESC

SELECT malware_name, device_name FROM Malware JOIN MalwarePropagation ON Malware.malware_id = MalwarePropagation.malware_id JOIN InfectedDevices ON MalwarePropagation.device_id = InfectedDevices.device_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_infected_devices FROM InfectedDevices WHERE infection_status = 'Infected'
SELECT device_name, current_status FROM DeviceStatus WHERE last_checked > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM malware_propagation;
SELECT malware_name, detection_date FROM malware_propagation ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM infected_devices WHERE device_type = 'PC';
SELECT malware_name, detection_date, containment_status FROM malware_propagation WHERE containment_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, infection_date FROM infected_devices ORDER BY infection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_propagation;
SELECT malware_name, detection_date FROM malware_propagation WHERE containment_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM infected_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;

SELECT m.malware_name, d.device_name, c.containment_date FROM malware_devices md JOIN malware_propagation m ON md.malware_id = m.malware_id JOIN infected_devices d ON md.device_id = d.device_id JOIN containment_logs c ON md.malware_id = c.malware_id AND md.device_id = c.device_id;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_summary FROM containment_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
